server_configuration_impi_loading_error: An error occurred while retrieving the information.
server_configuration_impi_off: The IPMI module is not available on this server.
server_configuration_impi_off_kvm: However, you can use a KVM to get this feature.
server_configuration_impi_disabled: The server status is {{t0}}. The IPMI module is disabled as a result.
server_configuration_impi_information: IPMI enables you to log in to your server via the following methods:
server_configuration_impi_information_ja: IPMI enables you to log in to your server via the following Java applet:
server_configuration_impi_information2:
By starting a 'Remote KVM' session (access to your remote server's keyboard, mouse and display) from your {{t0}} IP
  • From a Java Web Start applet
server_configuration_impi_information3:
By starting a 'Serial Over LAN' session (access to your server's serial console via a secure connection) from your {{t0}} IP
  • From your browser (HTTPS)
server_configuration_impi_navigation_err: An error has occurred attempting to connect to the IPMI module using your browser
server_configuration_impi_navigation_suc: The connection to the IPMI module using your browser is ready.
server_configuration_impi_java_success: The connection to the IPMI module using a Java applet is ready.
server_configuration_impi_java_error: An error has occurred attempting to connect to the IPMI module using a Java applet
server_configuration_impi_ssh_error: An error has occurred attempting to connect to the IPMI module in SSH
server_configuration_impi_ssh_success: The connection to the IPMI module in SSH is ready.
server_configuration_impi_restart_inform: Are you sure you want to reboot the IPMI?
server_configuration_impi_restart_error: An error has occurred requesting the IPMI module reboot
server_configuration_impi_restart_error_: An error has occurred rebooting the IPMI module
server_configuration_impi_restart_succes: The IPMI module has been rebooted.
server_configuration_impi_sessions_infor: Do you really want to delete the IPMI module sessions?
server_configuration_impi_sessions_error: An error has occurred requesting to delete the IPMI module sessions.
server_configuration_impi_restart_error_: An error has occurred deleting the IPMI module sessions.
server_configuration_impi_sessions_succe: The IPMI module sessions have been deleted.
server_configuration_impi_disable: The IPMI module features have been temporarily disabled because a task is in progress. They will be re-enabled once the task has been completed.
server_configuration_impi_monitoring_war: Remember to disable monitoring for your services before installing an operating system from the IPMI.
server_configuration_impi_SOL_help: The SOL session requires configuration on your part.
server_configuration_kvm_order_step2_tit: Order a KVM for the {{t0}} server
server_configuration_kvm_order_finish_su: Order number {{t1}} has been processed.
server_configuration_kvm_order_error: An error has occurred ordering the KVM.
server_configuration_kvm_error: An error has occurred retrieving your KVM details.
server_configuration_tile_kvm_descriptio: Remote access to your server's keyboard, mouse and screen display
server_configuration_tile_sol_descriptio: Access to your server's serial console via a secure connection
